title: South Africa: Cosatu Expresses Its Sympathy With Worshiper's Families After Hajj Stampede
text:
South Africa: Three Hurt As Whale Strikes Yacht Near Fish Hoek press release 
The Congress of South African Trade Unions has been shocked by the saddest news about a stampede at the occasion of a pilgrimage at Mecca, Saudi Arabia. 
More than 800 were reported injured after a crush at Mina on the outskirts of the Muslim holy city and 717 declared dead at the pilgrimage called Hajj. 
We wish all who were injured a speedy recovery. 
COSATU expresses its heartfelt condolences to all families affected by the tragedy. 
Our prayers and thoughts are with all families. South Africa
